casebody.data:
KELSEY-HAYES COMPANY, et al., petitioners,
v.
INTERNATIONAL UNION, UNITED AUTOMOBILE, AEROSPACE AND AGRICULTURAL IMPLEMENT WORKERS OF AMERICA, et al. No. 17-908. Supreme Court of the United States Feb. 26, 2018.

On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the *1167Sixth Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit for further consideration in light of CNH Industrial N.V. v. Reese, 583 U.S. ----, 138 S.Ct. 761, --- L.E.2d ---- (2018).
